AttachmentHandle.description: Response payload describing a stored attachment.
AttachmentHandle.title: AttachmentHandle

EmulationProfileRequirement.description: Sealed-profile requirement used to gate compliance-sensitive auth sources.

conformance_hash.description: sha256 hash over locked JSON pointers.
conformance_hash.title: Conformance Hash

locked_json_pointers.description: RFC6901 JSON pointers used for the hash.
locked_json_pointers.title: Locked Json Pointers

EmulationProfileRequirement.title: EmulationProfileRequirement

config_path.description: Config path used for sealed-profile enforcement.
config_path.title: Config Path

overrides.description: Optional dotted-key override map for hashing.
overrides.title: Overrides

ProviderAuthMaterial.description: Short-lived auth material that the Engine can apply to provider calls.

alias.description: Optional alias for multi-account support (MVP: unused).
alias.title: Alias

api_key.description: Provider API key or bearer token material.
api_key.title: Api Key

expires_at_ms.description: Optional expiry time in ms since epoch.
expires_at_ms.title: Expires At Ms

is_subscription_plan.description: Marks compliance-sensitive plan auth (defaults to false).
is_subscription_plan.title: Is Subscription Plan

issued_at_ms.description: Optional issue time in ms since epoch.
issued_at_ms.title: Issued At Ms

ttl_seconds.description: Optional TTL applied if expires_at_ms is absent.
ttl_seconds.title: Ttl Seconds

ProviderAuthMaterial.title: ProviderAuthMaterial

max_steps.description: Override max steps for the loop.
max_steps.title: Max Steps

task.description: User prompt or path to task file.
task.title: Task

post.description: Attach short-lived provider auth material to the in-memory engine store.
